summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4696 for the improvement of 19th Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to West 80th Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54446, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
